com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.spans

Class DotSpan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.spans.DotSpan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.style.LineBackgroundSpan, android.text.style.ParagraphStyle

    public class DotSpan
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.style.LineBackgroundSpan
    Span to draw a dot centered under a section of text
